                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my good lord.</div>
                              <div class="line">Gerard de Narbon was my father;</div>
                              <div class="line">In what he did profess, well found.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">I knew him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">The rather will I spare my praises towards him:</div>
                              <div class="line">Knowing him is enough. On's bed of death</div>
                              <div class="line">Many receipts he gave me: chiefly one.</div>
                              <div class="line">Which, as the dearest issue of his practise,</div>
                              <div class="line">And of his old experience the oily darling,</div>
                              <div class="line">He bade me store up, as a triple eye,</div>
                              <div class="line">Safer than mine own two, more dear; I have so;</div>
                              <div class="line">And hearing your high majesty is touch'd</div>
                              <div class="line">With that malignant cause wherein the honour</div>
                              <div class="line">Of my dear father's gift stands chief in power,</div>
                              <div class="line">I come to tender it and my appliance</div>
                              <div class="line">With all bound humbleness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">We thank you, maiden;</div>
                              <div class="line">But may not be so credulous of cure,</div>
                              <div class="line">When our most learned doctors leave us and</div>
                              <div class="line">The congregated college have concluded</div>
                              <div class="line">That labouring art can never ransom nature</div>
                              <div class="line">From her inaidible estate; I say we must not</div>
                              <div class="line">So stain our judgment, or corrupt our hope,</div>
                              <div class="line">To prostitute our past-cure malady</div>
                              <div class="line">To empirics, or to dissever so</div>
                              <div class="line">Our great self and our credit, to esteem</div>
                              <div class="line">A senseless help when help past sense we deem.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">My duty then shall pay me for my pains:</div>
                              <div class="line">I will no more enforce mine office on you.</div>
                              <div class="line">Humbly entreating from your royal thoughts</div>
                              <div class="line">A modest one, to bear me back a again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot give thee less, to be call'd grateful:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou thought'st to help me; and such thanks I give</div>
                              <div class="line">As one near death to those that wish him live:</div>
                              <div class="line">But what at full I know, thou know'st no part,</div>
                              <div class="line">I knowing all my peril, thou no art.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">What I can do can do no hurt to try,</div>
                              <div class="line">Since you set up your rest 'gainst remedy.</div>
                              <div class="line">He that of greatest works is finisher</div>
                              <div class="line">Oft does them by the weakest minister:</div>
                              <div class="line">So holy writ in babes hath judgment shown,</div>
                              <div class="line">When judges have been babes; great floods have flown</div>
                              <div class="line">From simple sources, and great seas have dried</div>
                              <div class="line">When miracles have by the greatest been denied.</div>
                              <div class="line">Oft expectation fails and most oft there</div>
                              <div class="line">Where most it promises, and oft it hits</div>
                              <div class="line">Where hope is coldest and despair most fits.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">I must not hear thee; fare thee well, kind maid;</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy pains not used must by thyself be paid:</div>
                              <div class="line">Proffers not took reap thanks for their reward.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">Inspired merit so by breath is barr'd:</div>
                              <div class="line">It is not so with Him that all things knows</div>
                              <div class="line">As 'tis with us that square our guess by shows;</div>
                              <div class="line">But most it is presumption in us when</div>
                              <div class="line">The help of heaven we count the act of men.</div>
                              <div class="line">Dear sir, to my endeavours give consent;</div>
                              <div class="line">Of heaven, not me, make an experiment.</div>
                              <div class="line">I am not an impostor that proclaim</div>
                              <div class="line">Myself against the level of mine aim;</div>
                              <div class="line">But know I think and think I know most sure</div>
                              <div class="line">My art is not past power nor you past cure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Are thou so confident? within what space</div>
                              <div class="line">Hopest thou my cure?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">The great'st grace lending grace</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere twice the horses of the sun shall bring</div>
                              <div class="line">Their fiery torcher his diurnal ring,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere twice in murk and occidental damp</div>
                              <div class="line">Moist Hesperus hath quench'd his sleepy lamp,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or four and twenty times the pilot's glass</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath told the thievish minutes how they pass,</div>
                              <div class="line">What is infirm from your sound parts shall fly,</div>
                              <div class="line">Health shall live free and sickness freely die.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon thy certainty and confidence</div>
                              <div class="line">What darest thou venture?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">Tax of impudence,</div>
                              <div class="line">A strumpet's boldness, a divulged shame</div>
                              <div class="line">Traduced by odious ballads: my maiden's name</div>
                              <div class="line">Sear'd otherwise; nay, worse--if worse--extended</div>
                              <div class="line">With vilest torture let my life be ended.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Methinks in thee some blessed spirit doth speak</div>
                              <div class="line">His powerful sound within an organ weak:</div>
                              <div class="line">And what impossibility would slay</div>
                              <div class="line">In common sense, sense saves another way.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy life is dear; for all that life can rate</div>
                              <div class="line">Worth name of life in thee hath estimate,</div>
                              <div class="line">Youth, beauty, wisdom, courage, all</div>
                              <div class="line">That happiness and prime can happy call:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou this to hazard needs must intimate</div>
                              <div class="line">Skill infinite or monstrous desperate.</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet practiser, thy physic I will try,</div>
                              <div class="line">That ministers thine own death if I die.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">If I break time, or flinch in property</div>
                              <div class="line">Of what I spoke, unpitied let me die,</div>
                              <div class="line">And well deserved: not helping, death's my fee;</div>
                              <div class="line">But, if I help, what do you promise me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Make thy demand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">But will you make it even?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, by my sceptre and my hopes of heaven.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">Then shalt thou give me with thy kingly hand</div>
                              <div class="line">What husband in thy power I will command:</div>
                              <div class="line">Exempted be from me the arrogance</div>
                              <div class="line">To choose from forth the royal blood of France,</div>
                              <div class="line">My low and humble name to propagate</div>
                              <div class="line">With any branch or image of thy state;</div>
                              <div class="line">But such a one, thy vassal, whom I know</div>
                              <div class="line">Is free for me to ask, thee to bestow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is my hand; the premises observed,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy will by my performance shall be served:</div>
                              <div class="line">So make the choice of thy own time, for I,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy resolved patient, on thee still rely.</div>
                              <div class="line">More should I question thee, and more I must,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though more to know could not be more to trust,</div>
                              <div class="line">From whence thou camest, how tended on: but rest</div>
                              <div class="line">Unquestion'd welcome and undoubted blest.</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me some help here, ho! If thou proceed</div>
                              <div class="line">As high as word, my deed shall match thy meed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Flourish. Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  Rousillon. The COUNT's palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter COUNTESS and Clown</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come on, sir; I shall now put you to the height of</div>
                              <div class="line">your breeding.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">I will show myself highly fed and lowly taught: I</div>
                              <div class="line">know my business is but to the court.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">To the court! why, what place make you special,</div>
                              <div class="line">when you put off that with such contempt? But to the court!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Truly, madam, if God have lent a man any manners, he</div>
                              <div class="line">may easily put it off at court: he that cannot make</div>
                              <div class="line">a leg, put off's cap, kiss his hand and say nothing,</div>
                              <div class="line">has neither leg, hands, lip, nor cap; and indeed</div>
                              <div class="line">such a fellow, to say precisely, were not for the</div>
                              <div class="line">court; but for me, I have an answer will serve all</div>
                              <div class="line">men.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, that's a bountiful answer that fits all</div>
                              <div class="line">questions.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">It is like a barber's chair that fits all buttocks,</div>
                              <div class="line">the pin-buttock, the quatch-buttock, the brawn</div>
                              <div class="line">buttock, or any buttock.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Will your answer serve fit to all questions?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">As fit as ten groats is for the hand of an attorney,</div>
                              <div class="line">as your French crown for your taffeta punk, as Tib's</div>
                              <div class="line">rush for Tom's forefinger, as a pancake for Shrove</div>
                              <div class="line">Tuesday, a morris for May-day, as the nail to his</div>
                              <div class="line">hole, the cuckold to his horn, as a scolding queen</div>
                              <div class="line">to a wrangling knave, as the nun's lip to the</div>
                              <div class="line">friar's mouth, nay, as the pudding to his skin.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you, I say, an answer of such fitness for all</div>
                              <div class="line">questions?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">From below your duke to beneath your constable, it</div>
                              <div class="line">will fit any question.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">It must be an answer of most monstrous size that</div>
                              <div class="line">must fit all demands.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">But a trifle neither, in good faith, if the learned</div>
                              <div class="line">should speak truth of it: here it is, and all that</div>
                              <div class="line">belongs to't. Ask me if I am a courtier: it shall</div>
                              <div class="line">do you no harm to learn.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">To be young again, if we could: I will be a fool in</div>
                              <div class="line">question, hoping to be the wiser by your answer. I</div>
                              <div class="line">pray you, sir, are you a courtier?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">O Lord, sir! There's a simple putting off. More,</div>
                              <div class="line">more, a hundred of them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, I am a poor friend of yours, that loves you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">O Lord, sir! Thick, thick, spare not me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">I think, sir, you can eat none of this homely meat.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">O Lord, sir! Nay, put me to't, I warrant you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">You were lately whipped, sir, as I think.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">O Lord, sir! spare not me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you cry, 'O Lord, sir!' at your whipping, and</div>
                              <div class="line">'spare not me?' Indeed your 'O Lord, sir!' is very</div>
                              <div class="line">sequent to your whipping: you would answer very well</div>
                              <div class="line">to a whipping, if you were but bound to't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">I ne'er had worse luck in my life in my 'O Lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">sir!' I see things may serve long, but not serve ever.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">I play the noble housewife with the time</div>
                              <div class="line">To entertain't so merrily with a fool.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">O Lord, sir! why, there't serves well again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">An end, sir; to your business. Give Helen this,</div>
                              <div class="line">And urge her to a present answer back:</div>
                              <div class="line">Commend me to my kinsmen and my son:</div>
                              <div class="line">This is not much.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Not much commendation to them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Not much employment for you: you understand me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Most fruitfully: I am there before my legs.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Haste you again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt severally</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  Paris. The KING's palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter BERTRAM, LAFEU, and PAROLLES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">They say miracles are past; and we have our</div>
                              <div class="line">philosophical persons, to make modern and familiar,</div>
                              <div class="line">things supernatural and causeless. Hence is it that</div>
                              <div class="line">we make trifles of terrors, ensconcing ourselves</div>
                              <div class="line">into seeming knowledge, when we should submit</div>
                              <div class="line">ourselves to an unknown fear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, 'tis the rarest argument of wonder that hath</div>
                              <div class="line">shot out in our latter times.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">And so 'tis.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">To be relinquish'd of the artists,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">So I say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Both of Galen and Paracelsus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">So I say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Of all the learned and authentic fellows,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Right; so I say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">That gave him out incurable,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, there 'tis; so say I too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Not to be helped,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Right; as 'twere, a man assured of a--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Uncertain life, and sure death.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Just, you say well; so would I have said.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">I may truly say, it is a novelty to the world.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">It is, indeed: if you will have it in showing, you</div>
                              <div class="line">shall read it in--what do you call there?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">A showing of a heavenly effect in an earthly actor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">That's it; I would have said the very same.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, your dolphin is not lustier: 'fore me,</div>
                              <div class="line">I speak in respect--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, 'tis strange, 'tis very strange, that is the</div>
                              <div class="line">brief and the tedious of it; and he's of a most</div>
                              <div class="line">facinerious spirit that will not acknowledge it to be the--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Very hand of heaven.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, so I say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">In a most weak--</div>
                              <p>pausing</p>
                              <div class="line">and debile minister, great power, great</div>
                              <div class="line">transcendence: which should, indeed, give us a</div>
                              <div class="line">further use to be made than alone the recovery of</div>
                              <div class="line">the king, as to be--</div>
                              <p>pausing</p>
                              <div class="line">generally thankful.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I would have said it; you say well. Here comes the king.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter KING, HELENA, and Attendants. LAFEU and
PAROLLES retire</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Lustig, as the Dutchman says: I'll like a maid the</div>
                              <div class="line">better, whilst I have a tooth in my head: why, he's</div>
                              <div class="line">able to lead her a coranto.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Mort du vinaigre! is not this Helen?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">'Fore God, I think so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, call before me all the lords in court.</div>
                              <div class="line">Sit, my preserver, by thy patient's side;</div>
                              <div class="line">And with this healthful hand, whose banish'd sense</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast repeal'd, a second time receive</div>
                              <div class="line">The confirmation of my promised gift,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which but attends thy naming.</div>
                              <p>Enter three or four Lords</p>
                              <div class="line">Fair maid, send forth thine eye: this youthful parcel</div>
                              <div class="line">Of noble bachelors stand at my bestowing,</div>
                              <div class="line">O'er whom both sovereign power and father's voice</div>
                              <div class="line">I have to use: thy frank election make;</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast power to choose, and they none to forsake.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">To each of you one fair and virtuous mistress</div>
                              <div class="line">Fall, when Love please! marry, to each, but one!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">I'ld give bay Curtal and his furniture,</div>
                              <div class="line">My mouth no more were broken than these boys',</div>
                              <div class="line">And writ as little beard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Peruse them well:</div>
                              <div class="line">Not one of those but had a noble father.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">Gentlemen,</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven hath through me restored the king to health.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">All</div>
                              <div class="line">We understand it, and thank heaven for you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">I am a simple maid, and therein wealthiest,</div>
                              <div class="line">That I protest I simply am a maid.</div>
                              <div class="line">Please it your majesty, I have done already:</div>
                              <div class="line">The blushes in my cheeks thus whisper me,</div>
                              <div class="line">'We blush that thou shouldst choose; but, be refused,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let the white death sit on thy cheek for ever;</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll ne'er come there again.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Make choice; and, see,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who shuns thy love shuns all his love in me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, Dian, from thy altar do I fly,</div>
                              <div class="line">And to imperial Love, that god most high,</div>
                              <div class="line">Do my sighs stream. Sir, will you hear my suit?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">And grant it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">Thanks, sir; all the rest is mute.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">I had rather be in this choice than throw ames-ace</div>
                              <div class="line">for my life.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">The honour, sir, that flames in your fair eyes,</div>
                              <div class="line">Before I speak, too threateningly replies:</div>
                              <div class="line">Love make your fortunes twenty times above</div>
                              <div class="line">Her that so wishes and her humble love!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">No better, if you please.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">My wish receive,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which great Love grant! and so, I take my leave.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Do all they deny her? An they were sons of mine,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'd have them whipped; or I would send them to the</div>
                              <div class="line">Turk, to make eunuchs of.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">Be not afraid that I your hand should take;</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll never do you wrong for your own sake:</div>
                              <div class="line">Blessing upon your vows! and in your bed</div>
                              <div class="line">Find fairer fortune, if you ever wed!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">These boys are boys of ice, they'll none have her:</div>
                              <div class="line">sure, they are bastards to the English; the French</div>
                              <div class="line">ne'er got 'em.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">You are too young, too happy, and too good,</div>
                              <div class="line">To make yourself a son out of my blood.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fourth Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Fair one, I think not so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">There's one grape yet; I am sure thy father drunk</div>
                              <div class="line">wine: but if thou be'st not an ass, I am a youth</div>
                              <div class="line">of fourteen; I have known thee already.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To BERTRAM</span>  I dare not say I take you; but I give</div>
                              <div class="line">Me and my service, ever whilst I live,</div>
                              <div class="line">Into your guiding power. This is the man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then, young Bertram, take her; she's thy wife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">My wife, my liege! I shall beseech your highness,</div>
                              <div class="line">In such a business give me leave to use</div>
                              <div class="line">The help of mine own eyes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Know'st thou not, Bertram,</div>
                              <div class="line">What she has done for me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, my good lord;</div>
                              <div class="line">But never hope to know why I should marry her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou know'st she has raised me from my sickly bed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">But follows it, my lord, to bring me down</div>
                              <div class="line">Must answer for your raising? I know her well:</div>
                              <div class="line">She had her breeding at my father's charge.</div>
                              <div class="line">A poor physician's daughter my wife! Disdain</div>
                              <div class="line">Rather corrupt me ever!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis only title thou disdain'st in her, the which</div>
                              <div class="line">I can build up. Strange is it that our bloods,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of colour, weight, and heat, pour'd all together,</div>
                              <div class="line">Would quite confound distinction, yet stand off</div>
                              <div class="line">In differences so mighty. If she be</div>
                              <div class="line">All that is virtuous, save what thou dislikest,</div>
                              <div class="line">A poor physician's daughter, thou dislikest</div>
                              <div class="line">Of virtue for the name: but do not so:</div>
                              <div class="line">From lowest place when virtuous things proceed,</div>
                              <div class="line">The place is dignified by the doer's deed:</div>
                              <div class="line">Where great additions swell's, and virtue none,</div>
                              <div class="line">It is a dropsied honour. Good alone</div>
                              <div class="line">Is good without a name. Vileness is so:</div>
                              <div class="line">The property by what it is should go,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not by the title. She is young, wise, fair;</div>
                              <div class="line">In these to nature she's immediate heir,</div>
                              <div class="line">And these breed honour: that is honour's scorn,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which challenges itself as honour's born</div>
                              <div class="line">And is not like the sire: honours thrive,</div>
                              <div class="line">When rather from our acts we them derive</div>
                              <div class="line">Than our foregoers: the mere word's a slave</div>
                              <div class="line">Debosh'd on every tomb, on every grave</div>
                              <div class="line">A lying trophy, and as oft is dumb</div>
                              <div class="line">Where dust and damn'd oblivion is the tomb</div>
                              <div class="line">Of honour'd bones indeed. What should be said?</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou canst like this creature as a maid,</div>
                              <div class="line">I can create the rest: virtue and she</div>
                              <div class="line">Is her own dower; honour and wealth from me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot love her, nor will strive to do't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou wrong'st thyself, if thou shouldst strive to choose.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">That you are well restored, my lord, I'm glad:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let the rest go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">My honour's at the stake; which to defeat,</div>
                              <div class="line">I must produce my power. Here, take her hand,</div>
                              <div class="line">Proud scornful boy, unworthy this good gift;</div>
                              <div class="line">That dost in vile misprision shackle up</div>
                              <div class="line">My love and her desert; that canst not dream,</div>
                              <div class="line">We, poising us in her defective scale,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall weigh thee to the beam; that wilt not know,</div>
                              <div class="line">It is in us to plant thine honour where</div>
                              <div class="line">We please to have it grow. Cheque thy contempt:</div>
                              <div class="line">Obey our will, which travails in thy good:</div>
                              <div class="line">Believe not thy disdain, but presently</div>
                              <div class="line">Do thine own fortunes that obedient right</div>
                              <div class="line">Which both thy duty owes and our power claims;</div>
                              <div class="line">Or I will throw thee from my care for ever</div>
                              <div class="line">Into the staggers and the careless lapse</div>
                              <div class="line">Of youth and ignorance; both my revenge and hate</div>
                              <div class="line">Loosing upon thee, in the name of justice,</div>
                              <div class="line">Without all terms of pity. Speak; thine answer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Pardon, my gracious lord; for I submit</div>
                              <div class="line">My fancy to your eyes: when I consider</div>
                              <div class="line">What great creation and what dole of honour</div>
                              <div class="line">Flies where you bid it, I find that she, which late</div>
                              <div class="line">Was in my nobler thoughts most base, is now</div>
                              <div class="line">The praised of the king; who, so ennobled,</div>
                              <div class="line">Is as 'twere born so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Take her by the hand,</div>
                              <div class="line">And tell her she is thine: to whom I promise</div>
                              <div class="line">A counterpoise, if not to thy estate</div>
                              <div class="line">A balance more replete.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">I take her hand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Good fortune and the favour of the king</div>
                              <div class="line">Smile upon this contract; whose ceremony</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall seem expedient on the now-born brief,</div>
                              <div class="line">And be perform'd to-night: the solemn feast</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall more attend upon the coming space,</div>
                              <div class="line">Expecting absent friends. As thou lovest her,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy love's to me religious; else, does err.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt all but LAFEU and PAROLLES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Advancing</span>  Do you hear, monsieur? a word with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Your pleasure, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Your lord and master did well to make his</div>
                              <div class="line">recantation.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Recantation! My lord! my master!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay; is it not a language I speak?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">A most harsh one, and not to be understood without</div>
                              <div class="line">bloody succeeding. My master!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Are you companion to the Count Rousillon?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">To any count, to all counts, to what is man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">To what is count's man: count's master is of</div>
                              <div class="line">another style.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">You are too old, sir; let it satisfy you, you are too old.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">I must tell thee, sirrah, I write man; to which</div>
                              <div class="line">title age cannot bring thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">What I dare too well do, I dare not do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">I did think thee, for two ordinaries, to be a pretty</div>
                              <div class="line">wise fellow; thou didst make tolerable vent of thy</div>
                              <div class="line">travel; it might pass: yet the scarfs and the</div>
                              <div class="line">bannerets about thee did manifoldly dissuade me from</div>
                              <div class="line">believing thee a vessel of too great a burthen. I</div>
                              <div class="line">have now found thee; when I lose thee again, I care</div>
                              <div class="line">not: yet art thou good for nothing but taking up; and</div>
                              <div class="line">that thou't scarce worth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Hadst thou not the privilege of antiquity upon thee,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not plunge thyself too far in anger, lest thou</div>
                              <div class="line">hasten thy trial; which if--Lord have mercy on thee</div>
                              <div class="line">for a hen! So, my good window of lattice, fare thee</div>
                              <div class="line">well: thy casement I need not open, for I look</div>
                              <div class="line">through thee. Give me thy hand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, you give me most egregious indignity.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, with all my heart; and thou art worthy of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I have not, my lord, deserved it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, good faith, every dram of it; and I will not</div>
                              <div class="line">bate thee a scruple.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I shall be wiser.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Even as soon as thou canst, for thou hast to pull at</div>
                              <div class="line">a smack o' the contrary. If ever thou be'st bound</div>
                              <div class="line">in thy scarf and beaten, thou shalt find what it is</div>
                              <div class="line">to be proud of thy bondage. I have a desire to hold</div>
                              <div class="line">my acquaintance with thee, or rather my knowledge,</div>
                              <div class="line">that I may say in the default, he is a man I know.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, you do me most insupportable vexation.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">I would it were hell-pains for thy sake, and my poor</div>
                              <div class="line">doing eternal: for doing I am past: as I will by</div>
                              <div class="line">thee, in what motion age will give me leave.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, thou hast a son shall take this disgrace off</div>
                              <div class="line">me; scurvy, old, filthy, scurvy lord! Well, I must</div>
                              <div class="line">be patient; there is no fettering of authority.</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll beat him, by my life, if I can meet him with</div>
                              <div class="line">any convenience, an he were double and double a</div>
                              <div class="line">lord. I'll have no more pity of his age than I</div>
                              <div class="line">would of--I'll beat him, an if I could but meet him again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter LAFEU</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Sirrah, your lord and master's married; there's news</div>
                              <div class="line">for you: you have a new mistress.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I most unfeignedly beseech your lordship to make</div>
                              <div class="line">some reservation of your wrongs: he is my good</div>
                              <div class="line">lord: whom I serve above is my master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Who? God?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">The devil it is that's thy master. Why dost thou</div>
                              <div class="line">garter up thy arms o' this fashion? dost make hose of</div>
                              <div class="line">sleeves? do other servants so? Thou wert best set</div>
                              <div class="line">thy lower part where thy nose stands. By mine</div>
                              <div class="line">honour, if I were but two hours younger, I'ld beat</div>
                              <div class="line">thee: methinks, thou art a general offence, and</div>
                              <div class="line">every man should beat thee: I think thou wast</div>
                              <div class="line">created for men to breathe themselves upon thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">This is hard and undeserved measure, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to, sir; you were beaten in Italy for picking a</div>
                              <div class="line">kernel out of a pomegranate; you are a vagabond and</div>
                              <div class="line">no true traveller: you are more saucy with lords</div>
                              <div class="line">and honourable personages than the commission of your</div>
                              <div class="line">birth and virtue gives you heraldry. You are not</div>
                              <div class="line">worth another word, else I'ld call you knave. I leave you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Good, very good; it is so then: good, very good;</div>
                              <div class="line">let it be concealed awhile.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter BERTRAM</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Undone, and forfeited to cares for ever!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">What's the matter, sweet-heart?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Although before the solemn priest I have sworn,</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not bed her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">What, what, sweet-heart?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">O my Parolles, they have married me!</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll to the Tuscan wars, and never bed her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">France is a dog-hole, and it no more merits</div>
                              <div class="line">The tread of a man's foot: to the wars!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">There's letters from my mother: what the import is,</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not yet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
