                              <div class="line">Ay, that would be known. To the wars, my boy, to the wars!</div>
                              <div class="line">He wears his honour in a box unseen,</div>
                              <div class="line">That hugs his kicky-wicky here at home,</div>
                              <div class="line">Spending his manly marrow in her arms,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which should sustain the bound and high curvet</div>
                              <div class="line">Of Mars's fiery steed. To other regions</div>
                              <div class="line">France is a stable; we that dwell in't jades;</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore, to the war!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">It shall be so: I'll send her to my house,</div>
                              <div class="line">Acquaint my mother with my hate to her,</div>
                              <div class="line">And wherefore I am fled; write to the king</div>
                              <div class="line">That which I durst not speak; his present gift</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall furnish me to those Italian fields,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where noble fellows strike: war is no strife</div>
                              <div class="line">To the dark house and the detested wife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Will this capriccio hold in thee? art sure?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Go with me to my chamber, and advise me.</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll send her straight away: to-morrow</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll to the wars, she to her single sorrow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, these balls bound; there's noise in it. 'Tis hard:</div>
                              <div class="line">A young man married is a man that's marr'd:</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore away, and leave her bravely; go:</div>
                              <div class="line">The king has done you wrong: but, hush, 'tis so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  Paris. The KING's palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter HELENA and Clown</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">My mother greets me kindly; is she well?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">She is not well; but yet she has her health: she's</div>
                              <div class="line">very merry; but yet she is not well: but thanks be</div>
                              <div class="line">given, she's very well and wants nothing i', the</div>
                              <div class="line">world; but yet she is not well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">If she be very well, what does she ail, that she's</div>
                              <div class="line">not very well?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Truly, she's very well indeed, but for two things.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">What two things?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">One, that she's not in heaven, whither God send her</div>
                              <div class="line">quickly! the other that she's in earth, from whence</div>
                              <div class="line">God send her quickly!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter PAROLLES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Bless you, my fortunate lady!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">I hope, sir, I have your good will to have mine own</div>
                              <div class="line">good fortunes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">You had my prayers to lead them on; and to keep them</div>
                              <div class="line">on, have them still. O, my knave, how does my old lady?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">So that you had her wrinkles and I her money,</div>
                              <div class="line">I would she did as you say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, I say nothing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, you are the wiser man; for many a man's</div>
                              <div class="line">tongue shakes out his master's undoing: to say</div>
                              <div class="line">nothing, to do nothing, to know nothing, and to have</div>
                              <div class="line">nothing, is to be a great part of your title; which</div>
                              <div class="line">is within a very little of nothing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Away! thou'rt a knave.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">You should have said, sir, before a knave thou'rt a</div>
                              <div class="line">knave; that's, before me thou'rt a knave: this had</div>
                              <div class="line">been truth, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to, thou art a witty fool; I have found thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Did you find me in yourself, sir? or were you</div>
                              <div class="line">taught to find me? The search, sir, was profitable;</div>
                              <div class="line">and much fool may you find in you, even to the</div>
                              <div class="line">world's pleasure and the increase of laughter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">A good knave, i' faith, and well fed.</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, my lord will go away to-night;</div>
                              <div class="line">A very serious business calls on him.</div>
                              <div class="line">The great prerogative and rite of love,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which, as your due, time claims, he does acknowledge;</div>
                              <div class="line">But puts it off to a compell'd restraint;</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose want, and whose delay, is strew'd with sweets,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which they distil now in the curbed time,</div>
                              <div class="line">To make the coming hour o'erflow with joy</div>
                              <div class="line">And pleasure drown the brim.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">What's his will else?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">That you will take your instant leave o' the king</div>
                              <div class="line">And make this haste as your own good proceeding,</div>
                              <div class="line">Strengthen'd with what apology you think</div>
                              <div class="line">May make it probable need.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">What more commands he?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">That, having this obtain'd, you presently</div>
                              <div class="line">Attend his further pleasure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">In every thing I wait upon his will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall report it so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you.</div>
                              <p>Exit PAROLLES</p>
                              <div class="line">Come, sirrah.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.6">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>5. SCENE V.  Paris. The KING's palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter LAFEU and BERTRAM</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">But I hope your lordship thinks not him a soldier.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, my lord, and of very valiant approof.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">You have it from his own deliverance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">And by other warranted testimony.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Then my dial goes not true: I took this lark for a bunting.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">I do assure you, my lord, he is very great in</div>
                              <div class="line">knowledge and accordingly valiant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">I have then sinned against his experience and</div>
                              <div class="line">transgressed against his valour; and my state that</div>
                              <div class="line">way is dangerous, since I cannot yet find in my</div>
                              <div class="line">heart to repent. Here he comes: I pray you, make</div>
                              <div class="line">us friends; I will pursue the amity.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter PAROLLES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To BERTRAM</span>  These things shall be done, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, sir, who's his tailor?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">O, I know him well, I, sir; he, sir, 's a good</div>
                              <div class="line">workman, a very good tailor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to PAROLLES</span>  Is she gone to the king?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">She is.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Will she away to-night?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">As you'll have her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">I have writ my letters, casketed my treasure,</div>
                              <div class="line">Given order for our horses; and to-night,</div>
                              <div class="line">When I should take possession of the bride,</div>
                              <div class="line">End ere I do begin.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">A good traveller is something at the latter end of a</div>
                              <div class="line">dinner; but one that lies three thirds and uses a</div>
                              <div class="line">known truth to pass a thousand nothings with, should</div>
                              <div class="line">be once heard and thrice beaten. God save you, captain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Is there any unkindness between my lord and you, monsieur?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not how I have deserved to run into my lord's</div>
                              <div class="line">displeasure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">You have made shift to run into 't, boots and spurs</div>
                              <div class="line">and all, like him that leaped into the custard; and</div>
                              <div class="line">out of it you'll run again, rather than suffer</div>
                              <div class="line">question for your residence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">It may be you have mistaken him, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">And shall do so ever, though I took him at 's</div>
                              <div class="line">prayers. Fare you well, my lord; and believe this</div>
                              <div class="line">of me, there can be no kernel in this light nut; the</div>
                              <div class="line">soul of this man is his clothes. Trust him not in</div>
                              <div class="line">matter of heavy consequence; I have kept of them</div>
                              <div class="line">tame, and know their natures. Farewell, monsieur:</div>
                              <div class="line">I have spoken better of you than you have or will to</div>
                              <div class="line">deserve at my hand; but we must do good against evil.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">An idle lord. I swear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">I think so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, do you not know him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, I do know him well, and common speech</div>
                              <div class="line">Gives him a worthy pass. Here comes my clog.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter HELENA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">I have, sir, as I was commanded from you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Spoke with the king and have procured his leave</div>
                              <div class="line">For present parting; only he desires</div>
                              <div class="line">Some private speech with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall obey his will.</div>
                              <div class="line">You must not marvel, Helen, at my course,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which holds not colour with the time, nor does</div>
                              <div class="line">The ministration and required office</div>
                              <div class="line">On my particular. Prepared I was not</div>
                              <div class="line">For such a business; therefore am I found</div>
                              <div class="line">So much unsettled: this drives me to entreat you</div>
                              <div class="line">That presently you take our way for home;</div>
                              <div class="line">And rather muse than ask why I entreat you,</div>
                              <div class="line">For my respects are better than they seem</div>
                              <div class="line">And my appointments have in them a need</div>
                              <div class="line">Greater than shows itself at the first view</div>
                              <div class="line">To you that know them not. This to my mother:</div>
                              <p>Giving a letter</p>
                              <div class="line">'Twill be two days ere I shall see you, so</div>
                              <div class="line">I leave you to your wisdom.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, I can nothing say,</div>
                              <div class="line">But that I am your most obedient servant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, no more of that.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">And ever shall</div>
                              <div class="line">With true observance seek to eke out that</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherein toward me my homely stars have fail'd</div>
                              <div class="line">To equal my great fortune.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Let that go:</div>
                              <div class="line">My haste is very great: farewell; hie home.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray, sir, your pardon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, what would you say?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">I am not worthy of the wealth I owe,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor dare I say 'tis mine, and yet it is;</div>
                              <div class="line">But, like a timorous thief, most fain would steal</div>
                              <div class="line">What law does vouch mine own.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">What would you have?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">Something; and scarce so much: nothing, indeed.</div>
                              <div class="line">I would not tell you what I would, my lord:</div>
                              <div class="line">Faith yes;</div>
                              <div class="line">Strangers and foes do sunder, and not kiss.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, stay not, but in haste to horse.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall not break your bidding, good my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Where are my other men, monsieur? Farewell.</div>
                              <p>Exit HELENA</p>
                              <div class="line">Go thou toward home; where I will never come</div>
                              <div class="line">Whilst I can shake my sword or hear the drum.</div>
                              <div class="line">Away, and for our flight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Bravely, coragio!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.5">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 3. ACT III</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. SCENE I.  Florence. The DUKE's palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.3">2. SCENE II.  Rousillon. The COUNT's palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.4">3. SCENE III.  Florence. Before the DUKE's palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.5">4. SCENE IV.  Rousillon. The COUNT's palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.6">5. SCENE V.  Florence. Without the walls. A tucket afar off.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.7">6. SCENE VI.  Camp before Florence.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.8">7. SCENE VII.  Florence. The Widow's house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Florence. The DUKE's palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Flourish. Enter the DUKE of Florence attended;
the two Frenchmen, with a troop of soldiers.</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                              <div class="line">So that from point to point now have you heard</div>
                              <div class="line">The fundamental reasons of this war,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose great decision hath much blood let forth</div>
                              <div class="line">And more thirsts after.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Holy seems the quarrel</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon your grace's part; black and fearful</div>
                              <div class="line">On the opposer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore we marvel much our cousin France</div>
                              <div class="line">Would in so just a business shut his bosom</div>
                              <div class="line">Against our borrowing prayers.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Good my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">The reasons of our state I cannot yield,</div>
                              <div class="line">But like a common and an outward man,</div>
                              <div class="line">That the great figure of a council frames</div>
                              <div class="line">By self-unable motion: therefore dare not</div>
                              <div class="line">Say what I think of it, since I have found</div>
                              <div class="line">Myself in my incertain grounds to fail</div>
                              <div class="line">As often as I guess'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                              <div class="line">Be it his pleasure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Lord</div>
                              <div class="line">But I am sure the younger of our nature,</div>
                              <div class="line">That surfeit on their ease, will day by day</div>
                              <div class="line">Come here for physic.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                              <div class="line">Welcome shall they be;</div>
                              <div class="line">And all the honours that can fly from us</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall on them settle. You know your places well;</div>
                              <div class="line">When better fall, for your avails they fell:</div>
                              <div class="line">To-morrow to the field.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Flourish. Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  Rousillon. The COUNT's palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter COUNTESS and Clown</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">It hath happened all as I would have had it, save</div>
                              <div class="line">that he comes not along with her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">By my troth, I take my young lord to be a very</div>
                              <div class="line">melancholy man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">By what observance, I pray you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, he will look upon his boot and sing; mend the</div>
                              <div class="line">ruff and sing; ask questions and sing; pick his</div>
                              <div class="line">teeth and sing. I know a man that had this trick of</div>
                              <div class="line">melancholy sold a goodly manor for a song.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me see what he writes, and when he means to come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Opening a letter</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">I have no mind to Isbel since I was at court: our</div>
                              <div class="line">old ling and our Isbels o' the country are nothing</div>
                              <div class="line">like your old ling and your Isbels o' the court:</div>
                              <div class="line">the brains of my Cupid's knocked out, and I begin to</div>
                              <div class="line">love, as an old man loves money, with no stomach.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">What have we here?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">E'en that you have there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  I have sent you a daughter-in-law: she hath</div>
                              <div class="line">recovered the king, and undone me. I have wedded</div>
                              <div class="line">her, not bedded her; and sworn to make the 'not'</div>
                              <div class="line">eternal. You shall hear I am run away: know it</div>
                              <div class="line">before the report come. If there be breadth enough</div>
                              <div class="line">in the world, I will hold a long distance. My duty</div>
                              <div class="line">to you. Your unfortunate son,</div>
                              <div class="line">BERTRAM.</div>
                              <div class="line">This is not well, rash and unbridled boy.</div>
                              <div class="line">To fly the favours of so good a king;</div>
                              <div class="line">To pluck his indignation on thy head</div>
                              <div class="line">By the misprising of a maid too virtuous</div>
                              <div class="line">For the contempt of empire.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter Clown</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">O madam, yonder is heavy news within between two</div>
                              <div class="line">soldiers and my young lady!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">What is the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, there is some comfort in the news, some</div>
                              <div class="line">comfort; your son will not be killed so soon as I</div>
                              <div class="line">thought he would.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why should he be killed?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">So say I, madam, if he run away, as I hear he does:</div>
                              <div class="line">the danger is in standing to't; that's the loss of</div>
                              <div class="line">men, though it be the getting of children. Here</div>
                              <div class="line">they come will tell you more: for my part, I only</div>
                              <div class="line">hear your son was run away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <p>Enter HELENA, and two Gentlemen</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Save you, good madam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, my lord is gone, for ever gone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not say so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Think upon patience. Pray you, gentlemen,</div>
                              <div class="line">I have felt so many quirks of joy and grief,</div>
                              <div class="line">That the first face of neither, on the start,</div>
                              <div class="line">Can woman me unto't: where is my son, I pray you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, he's gone to serve the duke of Florence:</div>
                              <div class="line">We met him thitherward; for thence we came,</div>
                              <div class="line">And, after some dispatch in hand at court,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thither we bend again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">Look on his letter, madam; here's my passport.</div>
                              <p>Reads</p>
                              <div class="line">When thou canst get the ring upon my finger which</div>
                              <div class="line">never shall come off, and show me a child begotten</div>
                              <div class="line">of thy body that I am father to, then call me</div>
                              <div class="line">husband: but in such a 'then' I write a 'never.'</div>
                              <div class="line">This is a dreadful sentence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Brought you this letter, gentlemen?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, madam;</div>
                              <div class="line">And for the contents' sake are sorry for our pain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee, lady, have a better cheer;</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou engrossest all the griefs are thine,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou robb'st me of a moiety: he was my son;</div>
                              <div class="line">But I do wash his name out of my blood,</div>
                              <div class="line">And thou art all my child. Towards Florence is he?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, madam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">And to be a soldier?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Such is his noble purpose; and believe 't,</div>
                              <div class="line">The duke will lay upon him all the honour</div>
                              <div class="line">That good convenience claims.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Return you thither?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, madam, with the swiftest wing of speed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  Till I have no wife I have nothing in France.</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis bitter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Find you that there?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, madam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis but the boldness of his hand, haply, which his</div>
                              <div class="line">heart was not consenting to.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nothing in France, until he have no wife!</div>
                              <div class="line">There's nothing here that is too good for him</div>
                              <div class="line">But only she; and she deserves a lord</div>
                              <div class="line">That twenty such rude boys might tend upon</div>
                              <div class="line">And call her hourly mistress. Who was with him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">A servant only, and a gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Which I have sometime known.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Parolles, was it not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my good lady, he.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">A very tainted fellow, and full of wickedness.</div>
                              <div class="line">My son corrupts a well-derived nature</div>
                              <div class="line">With his inducement.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed, good lady,</div>
                              <div class="line">The fellow has a deal of that too much,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which holds him much to have.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">You're welcome, gentlemen.</div>
                              <div class="line">I will entreat you, when you see my son,</div>
                              <div class="line">To tell him that his sword can never win</div>
                              <div class="line">The honour that he loses: more I'll entreat you</div>
                              <div class="line">Written to bear along.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">We serve you, madam,</div>
                              <div class="line">In that and all your worthiest affairs.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Not so, but as we change our courtesies.</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you draw near!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt COUNTESS and Gentlemen</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">'Till I have no wife, I have nothing in France.'</div>
                              <div class="line">Nothing in France, until he has no wife!</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou shalt have none, Rousillon, none in France;</div>
                              <div class="line">Then hast thou all again. Poor lord! is't I</div>
                              <div class="line">That chase thee from thy country and expose</div>
                              <div class="line">Those tender limbs of thine to the event</div>
                              <div class="line">Of the none-sparing war? and is it I</div>
                              <div class="line">That drive thee from the sportive court, where thou</div>
                              <div class="line">Wast shot at with fair eyes, to be the mark</div>
                              <div class="line">Of smoky muskets? O you leaden messengers,</div>
                              <div class="line">That ride upon the violent speed of fire,</div>
                              <div class="line">Fly with false aim; move the still-peering air,</div>
                              <div class="line">That sings with piercing; do not touch my lord.</div>
                              <div class="line">Whoever shoots at him, I set him there;</div>
                              <div class="line">Whoever charges on his forward breast,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am the caitiff that do hold him to't;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, though I kill him not, I am the cause</div>
                              <div class="line">His death was so effected: better 'twere</div>
                              <div class="line">I met the ravin lion when he roar'd</div>
                              <div class="line">With sharp constraint of hunger; better 'twere</div>
                              <div class="line">That all the miseries which nature owes</div>
                              <div class="line">Were mine at once. No, come thou home, Rousillon,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whence honour but of danger wins a scar,</div>
                              <div class="line">As oft it loses all: I will be gone;</div>
                              <div class="line">My being here it is that holds thee hence:</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall I stay here to do't?  no, no, although</div>
                              <div class="line">The air of paradise did fan the house</div>
                              <div class="line">And angels officed all: I will be gone,</div>
                              <div class="line">That pitiful rumour may report my flight,</div>
                              <div class="line">To consolate thine ear. Come, night; end, day!</div>
                              <div class="line">For with the dark, poor thief, I'll steal away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  Florence. Before the DUKE's palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Flourish. Enter the DUKE of Florence, BERTRAM,
PAROLLES, Soldiers, Drum, and Trumpets</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                              <div class="line">The general of our horse thou art; and we,</div>
                              <div class="line">Great in our hope, lay our best love and credence</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon thy promising fortune.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, it is</div>
                              <div class="line">A charge too heavy for my strength, but yet</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll strive to bear it for your worthy sake</div>
                              <div class="line">To the extreme edge of hazard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                              <div class="line">Then go thou forth;</div>
                              <div class="line">And fortune play upon thy prosperous helm,</div>
                              <div class="line">As thy auspicious mistress!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">This very day,</div>
                              <div class="line">Great Mars, I put myself into thy file:</div>
                              <div class="line">Make me but like my thoughts, and I shall prove</div>
                              <div class="line">A lover of thy drum, hater of love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  Rousillon. The COUNT's palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter COUNTESS and Steward</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas! and would you take the letter of her?</div>
                              <div class="line">Might you not know she would do as she has done,</div>
                              <div class="line">By sending me a letter? Read it again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Steward</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>
                              </div>
                              <div class="line">I am Saint Jaques' pilgrim, thither gone:</div>
                              <div class="line">Ambitious love hath so in me offended,</div>
                              <div class="line">That barefoot plod I the cold ground upon,</div>
                              <div class="line">With sainted vow my faults to have amended.</div>
                              <div class="line">Write, write, that from the bloody course of war</div>
                              <div class="line">My dearest master, your dear son, may hie:</div>
                              <div class="line">Bless him at home in peace, whilst I from far</div>
                              <div class="line">His name with zealous fervor sanctify:</div>
                              <div class="line">His taken labours bid him me forgive;</div>
                              <div class="line">I, his despiteful Juno, sent him forth</div>
                              <div class="line">From courtly friends, with camping foes to live,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where death and danger dogs the heels of worth:</div>
                              <div class="line">He is too good and fair for death and me:</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom I myself embrace, to set him free.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ah, what sharp stings are in her mildest words!</div>
                              <div class="line">Rinaldo, you did never lack advice so much,</div>
                              <div class="line">As letting her pass so: had I spoke with her,</div>
                              <div class="line">I could have well diverted her intents,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which thus she hath prevented.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Steward</div>
                              <div class="line">Pardon me, madam:</div>
                              <div class="line">If I had given you this at over-night,</div>
                              <div class="line">She might have been o'erta'en; and yet she writes,</div>
                              <div class="line">Pursuit would be but vain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">What angel shall</div>
                              <div class="line">Bless this unworthy husband? he cannot thrive,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unless her prayers, whom heaven delights to hear</div>
                              <div class="line">And loves to grant, reprieve him from the wrath</div>
                              <div class="line">Of greatest justice. Write, write, Rinaldo,</div>
                              <div class="line">To this unworthy husband of his wife;</div>
                              <div class="line">Let every word weigh heavy of her worth</div>
                              <div class="line">That he does weigh too light: my greatest grief.</div>
                              <div class="line">Though little he do feel it, set down sharply.</div>
                              <div class="line">Dispatch the most convenient messenger:</div>
                              <div class="line">When haply he shall hear that she is gone,</div>
                              <div class="line">He will return; and hope I may that she,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hearing so much, will speed her foot again,</div>
                              <div class="line">Led hither by pure love: which of them both</div>
                              <div class="line">Is dearest to me. I have no skill in sense</div>
                              <div class="line">To make distinction: provide this messenger:</div>
                              <div class="line">My heart is heavy and mine age is weak;</div>
                              <div class="line">Grief would have tears, and sorrow bids me speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.6">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>5. SCENE V.  Florence. Without the walls. A tucket afar off.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter an old Widow of Florence, DIANA, VIOLENTA,
and MARIANA, with other Citizens</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Widow</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, come; for if they do approach the city, we</div>
                              <div class="line">shall lose all the sight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">They say the French count has done most honourable service.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Widow</div>
                              <div class="line">It is reported that he has taken their greatest</div>
                              <div class="line">commander; and that with his own hand he slew the</div>
                              <div class="line">duke's brother.</div>
                              <p>Tucket</p>
                              <div class="line">We have lost our labour; they are gone a contrary</div>
                              <div class="line">way: hark! you may know by their trumpets.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, let's return again, and suffice ourselves with</div>
                              <div class="line">the report of it. Well, Diana, take heed of this</div>
                              <div class="line">French earl: the honour of a maid is her name; and</div>
                              <div class="line">no legacy is so rich as honesty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Widow</div>
                              <div class="line">I have told my neighbour how you have been solicited</div>
                              <div class="line">by a gentleman his companion.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">I know that knave; hang him! one Parolles: a</div>
                              <div class="line">filthy officer he is in those suggestions for the</div>
                              <div class="line">young earl. Beware of them, Diana; their promises,</div>
                              <div class="line">enticements, oaths, tokens, and all these engines of</div>
                              <div class="line">lust, are not the things they go under: many a maid</div>
                              <div class="line">hath been seduced by them; and the misery is,</div>
                              <div class="line">example, that so terrible shows in the wreck of</div>
                              <div class="line">maidenhood, cannot for all that dissuade succession,</div>
                              <div class="line">but that they are limed with the twigs that threaten</div>
                              <div class="line">them. I hope I need not to advise you further; but</div>
                              <div class="line">I hope your own grace will keep you where you are,</div>
                              <div class="line">though there were no further danger known but the</div>
                              <div class="line">modesty which is so lost.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall not need to fear me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Widow</div>
                              <div class="line">I hope so.</div>
                              <p>Enter HELENA, disguised like a Pilgrim</p>
                              <div class="line">Look, here comes a pilgrim: I know she will lie at</div>
                              <div class="line">my house; thither they send one another: I'll</div>
                              <div class="line">question her. God save you, pilgrim! whither are you bound?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">To Saint Jaques le Grand.</div>
                              <div class="line">Where do the palmers lodge, I do beseech you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Widow</div>
                              <div class="line">At the Saint Francis here beside the port.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">Is this the way?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Widow</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, marry, is't.</div>
                              <p>A march afar</p>
                              <div class="line">Hark you! they come this way.</div>
                              <div class="line">If you will tarry, holy pilgrim,</div>
                              <div class="line">But till the troops come by,</div>
                              <div class="line">I will conduct you where you shall be lodged;</div>
                              <div class="line">The rather, for I think I know your hostess</div>
                              <div class="line">As ample as myself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">Is it yourself?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Widow</div>
                              <div class="line">If you shall please so, pilgrim.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank you, and will stay upon your leisure.</div>
                           </div>
