                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.2">1. SCENE I.  Marseilles. A street.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.3">2. SCENE II.  Rousillon. Before the COUNT's palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.4">3. SCENE III.  Rousillon. The COUNT's palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.5">4. EPILOGUE</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Marseilles. A street.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter HELENA, Widow, and DIANA, with two
Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">But this exceeding posting day and night</div>
                              <div class="line">Must wear your spirits low; we cannot help it:</div>
                              <div class="line">But since you have made the days and nights as one,</div>
                              <div class="line">To wear your gentle limbs in my affairs,</div>
                              <div class="line">Be bold you do so grow in my requital</div>
                              <div class="line">As nothing can unroot you. In happy time;</div>
                              <p>Enter a Gentleman</p>
                              <div class="line">This man may help me to his majesty's ear,</div>
                              <div class="line">If he would spend his power. God save you, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">And you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, I have seen you in the court of France.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">I have been sometimes there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">I do presume, sir, that you are not fallen</div>
                              <div class="line">From the report that goes upon your goodness;</div>
                              <div class="line">An therefore, goaded with most sharp occasions,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which lay nice manners by, I put you to</div>
                              <div class="line">The use of your own virtues, for the which</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall continue thankful.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">What's your will?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">That it will please you</div>
                              <div class="line">To give this poor petition to the king,</div>
                              <div class="line">And aid me with that store of power you have</div>
                              <div class="line">To come into his presence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">The king's not here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">Not here, sir!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Not, indeed:</div>
                              <div class="line">He hence removed last night and with more haste</div>
                              <div class="line">Than is his use.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Widow</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord, how we lose our pains!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">All's well that ends well yet,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though time seem so adverse and means unfit.</div>
                              <div class="line">I do beseech you, whither is he gone?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, as I take it, to Rousillon;</div>
                              <div class="line">Whither I am going.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">I do beseech you, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">Since you are like to see the king before me,</div>
                              <div class="line">Commend the paper to his gracious hand,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which I presume shall render you no blame</div>
                              <div class="line">But rather make you thank your pains for it.</div>
                              <div class="line">I will come after you with what good speed</div>
                              <div class="line">Our means will make us means.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">This I'll do for you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">And you shall find yourself to be well thank'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whate'er falls more. We must to horse again.</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, go, provide.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  Rousillon. Before the COUNT's palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter Clown, and PAROLLES, following</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Monsieur Lavache, give my Lord Lafeu this</div>
                              <div class="line">letter: I have ere now, sir, been better known to</div>
                              <div class="line">you, when I have held familiarity with fresher</div>
                              <div class="line">clothes; but I am now, sir, muddied in fortune's</div>
                              <div class="line">mood, and smell somewhat strong of her strong</div>
                              <div class="line">displeasure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Truly, fortune's displeasure is but sluttish, if it</div>
                              <div class="line">smell so strongly as thou speakest of: I will</div>
                              <div class="line">henceforth eat no fish of fortune's buttering.</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, allow the wind.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, you need not to stop your nose, sir; I spake</div>
                              <div class="line">but by a metaphor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed, sir, if your metaphor stink, I will stop my</div>
                              <div class="line">nose; or against any man's metaphor. Prithee, get</div>
                              <div class="line">thee further.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, sir, deliver me this paper.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Foh! prithee, stand away: a paper from fortune's</div>
                              <div class="line">close-stool to give to a nobleman! Look, here he</div>
                              <div class="line">comes himself.</div>
                              <p>Enter LAFEU</p>
                              <div class="line">Here is a purr of fortune's, sir, or of fortune's</div>
                              <div class="line">cat,--but not a musk-cat,--that has fallen into the</div>
                              <div class="line">unclean fishpond of her displeasure, and, as he</div>
                              <div class="line">says, is muddied withal: pray you, sir, use the</div>
                              <div class="line">carp as you may; for he looks like a poor, decayed,</div>
                              <div class="line">ingenious, foolish, rascally knave. I do pity his</div>
                              <div class="line">distress in my similes of comfort and leave him to</div>
                              <div class="line">your lordship.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, I am a man whom fortune hath cruelly</div>
                              <div class="line">scratched.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">And what would you have me to do? 'Tis too late to</div>
                              <div class="line">pare her nails now. Wherein have you played the</div>
                              <div class="line">knave with fortune, that she should scratch you, who</div>
                              <div class="line">of herself is a good lady and would not have knaves</div>
                              <div class="line">thrive long under her? There's a quart d'ecu for</div>
                              <div class="line">you: let the justices make you and fortune friends:</div>
                              <div class="line">I am for other business.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I beseech your honour to hear me one single word.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">You beg a single penny more: come, you shall ha't;</div>
                              <div class="line">save your word.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">My name, my good lord, is Parolles.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">You beg more than 'word,' then. Cox my passion!</div>
                              <div class="line">give me your hand. How does your drum?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">O my good lord, you were the first that found me!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Was I, in sooth? and I was the first that lost thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">It lies in you, my lord, to bring me in some grace,</div>
                              <div class="line">for you did bring me out.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Out upon thee, knave! dost thou put upon me at once</div>
                              <div class="line">both the office of God and the devil? One brings</div>
                              <div class="line">thee in grace and the other brings thee out.</div>
                              <p>Trumpets sound</p>
                              <div class="line">The king's coming; I know by his trumpets. Sirrah,</div>
                              <div class="line">inquire further after me; I had talk of you last</div>
                              <div class="line">night: though you are a fool and a knave, you shall</div>
                              <div class="line">eat; go to, follow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I praise God for you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  Rousillon. The COUNT's palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Flourish. Enter KING, COUNTESS, LAFEU, the two
French Lords, with Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">We lost a jewel of her; and our esteem</div>
                              <div class="line">Was made much poorer by it: but your son,</div>
                              <div class="line">As mad in folly, lack'd the sense to know</div>
                              <div class="line">Her estimation home.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis past, my liege;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I beseech your majesty to make it</div>
                              <div class="line">Natural rebellion, done i' the blaze of youth;</div>
                              <div class="line">When oil and fire, too strong for reason's force,</div>
                              <div class="line">O'erbears it and burns on.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">My honour'd lady,</div>
                              <div class="line">I have forgiven and forgotten all;</div>
                              <div class="line">Though my revenges were high bent upon him,</div>
                              <div class="line">And watch'd the time to shoot.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">This I must say,</div>
                              <div class="line">But first I beg my pardon, the young lord</div>
                              <div class="line">Did to his majesty, his mother and his lady</div>
                              <div class="line">Offence of mighty note; but to himself</div>
                              <div class="line">The greatest wrong of all. He lost a wife</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose beauty did astonish the survey</div>
                              <div class="line">Of richest eyes, whose words all ears took captive,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose dear perfection hearts that scorn'd to serve</div>
                              <div class="line">Humbly call'd mistress.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Praising what is lost</div>
                              <div class="line">Makes the remembrance dear. Well, call him hither;</div>
                              <div class="line">We are reconciled, and the first view shall kill</div>
                              <div class="line">All repetition: let him not ask our pardon;</div>
                              <div class="line">The nature of his great offence is dead,</div>
                              <div class="line">And deeper than oblivion we do bury</div>
                              <div class="line">The incensing relics of it: let him approach,</div>
                              <div class="line">A stranger, no offender; and inform him</div>
                              <div class="line">So 'tis our will he should.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall, my liege.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">What says he to your daughter? have you spoke?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">All that he is hath reference to your highness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Then shall we have a match. I have letters sent me</div>
                              <div class="line">That set him high in fame.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter BERTRAM</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">He looks well on't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">I am not a day of season,</div>
                              <div class="line">For thou mayst see a sunshine and a hail</div>
                              <div class="line">In me at once: but to the brightest beams</div>
                              <div class="line">Distracted clouds give way; so stand thou forth;</div>
                              <div class="line">The time is fair again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">My high-repented blames,</div>
                              <div class="line">Dear sovereign, pardon to me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">All is whole;</div>
                              <div class="line">Not one word more of the consumed time.</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's take the instant by the forward top;</div>
                              <div class="line">For we are old, and on our quick'st decrees</div>
                              <div class="line">The inaudible and noiseless foot of Time</div>
                              <div class="line">Steals ere we can effect them. You remember</div>
                              <div class="line">The daughter of this lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Admiringly, my liege, at first</div>
                              <div class="line">I stuck my choice upon her, ere my heart</div>
                              <div class="line">Durst make too bold a herald of my tongue</div>
                              <div class="line">Where the impression of mine eye infixing,</div>
                              <div class="line">Contempt his scornful perspective did lend me,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which warp'd the line of every other favour;</div>
                              <div class="line">Scorn'd a fair colour, or express'd it stolen;</div>
                              <div class="line">Extended or contracted all proportions</div>
                              <div class="line">To a most hideous object: thence it came</div>
                              <div class="line">That she whom all men praised and whom myself,</div>
                              <div class="line">Since I have lost, have loved, was in mine eye</div>
                              <div class="line">The dust that did offend it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Well excused:</div>
                              <div class="line">That thou didst love her, strikes some scores away</div>
                              <div class="line">From the great compt: but love that comes too late,</div>
                              <div class="line">Like a remorseful pardon slowly carried,</div>
                              <div class="line">To the great sender turns a sour offence,</div>
                              <div class="line">Crying, 'That's good that's gone.' Our rash faults</div>
                              <div class="line">Make trivial price of serious things we have,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not knowing them until we know their grave:</div>
                              <div class="line">Oft our displeasures, to ourselves unjust,</div>
                              <div class="line">Destroy our friends and after weep their dust</div>
                              <div class="line">Our own love waking cries to see what's done,</div>
                              <div class="line">While shame full late sleeps out the afternoon.</div>
                              <div class="line">Be this sweet Helen's knell, and now forget her.</div>
                              <div class="line">Send forth your amorous token for fair Maudlin:</div>
                              <div class="line">The main consents are had; and here we'll stay</div>
                              <div class="line">To see our widower's second marriage-day.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Which better than the first, O dear heaven, bless!</div>
                              <div class="line">Or, ere they meet, in me, O nature, cesse!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Come on, my son, in whom my house's name</div>
                              <div class="line">Must be digested, give a favour from you</div>
                              <div class="line">To sparkle in the spirits of my daughter,</div>
                              <div class="line">That she may quickly come.</div>
                              <p>BERTRAM gives a ring</p>
                              <div class="line">By my old beard,</div>
                              <div class="line">And every hair that's on't, Helen, that's dead,</div>
                              <div class="line">Was a sweet creature: such a ring as this,</div>
                              <div class="line">The last that e'er I took her at court,</div>
                              <div class="line">I saw upon her finger.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Hers it was not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, pray you, let me see it; for mine eye,</div>
                              <div class="line">While I was speaking, oft was fasten'd to't.</div>
                              <div class="line">This ring was mine; and, when I gave it Helen,</div>
                              <div class="line">I bade her, if her fortunes ever stood</div>
                              <div class="line">Necessitied to help, that by this token</div>
                              <div class="line">I would relieve her. Had you that craft, to reave</div>
                              <div class="line">her</div>
                              <div class="line">Of what should stead her most?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">My gracious sovereign,</div>
                              <div class="line">Howe'er it pleases you to take it so,</div>
                              <div class="line">The ring was never hers.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Son, on my life,</div>
                              <div class="line">I have seen her wear it; and she reckon'd it</div>
                              <div class="line">At her life's rate.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">I am sure I saw her wear it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">You are deceived, my lord; she never saw it:</div>
                              <div class="line">In Florence was it from a casement thrown me,</div>
                              <div class="line">Wrapp'd in a paper, which contain'd the name</div>
                              <div class="line">Of her that threw it: noble she was, and thought</div>
                              <div class="line">I stood engaged: but when I had subscribed</div>
                              <div class="line">To mine own fortune and inform'd her fully</div>
                              <div class="line">I could not answer in that course of honour</div>
                              <div class="line">As she had made the overture, she ceased</div>
                              <div class="line">In heavy satisfaction and would never</div>
                              <div class="line">Receive the ring again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Plutus himself,</div>
                              <div class="line">That knows the tinct and multiplying medicine,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath not in nature's mystery more science</div>
                              <div class="line">Than I have in this ring: 'twas mine, 'twas Helen's,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whoever gave it you. Then, if you know</div>
                              <div class="line">That you are well acquainted with yourself,</div>
                              <div class="line">Confess 'twas hers, and by what rough enforcement</div>
                              <div class="line">You got it from her: she call'd the saints to surety</div>
                              <div class="line">That she would never put it from her finger,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unless she gave it to yourself in bed,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where you have never come, or sent it us</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon her great disaster.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">She never saw it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou speak'st it falsely, as I love mine honour;</div>
                              <div class="line">And makest conjectural fears to come into me</div>
                              <div class="line">Which I would fain shut out. If it should prove</div>
                              <div class="line">That thou art so inhuman,--'twill not prove so;--</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet I know not: thou didst hate her deadly,</div>
                              <div class="line">And she is dead; which nothing, but to close</div>
                              <div class="line">Her eyes myself, could win me to believe,</div>
                              <div class="line">More than to see this ring. Take him away.</div>
                              <p>Guards seize BERTRAM</p>
                              <div class="line">My fore-past proofs, howe'er the matter fall,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall tax my fears of little vanity,</div>
                              <div class="line">Having vainly fear'd too little. Away with him!</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll sift this matter further.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">If you shall prove</div>
                              <div class="line">This ring was ever hers, you shall as easy</div>
                              <div class="line">Prove that I husbanded her bed in Florence,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where yet she never was.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit, guarded</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">I am wrapp'd in dismal thinkings.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter a Gentleman</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Gracious sovereign,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whether I have been to blame or no, I know not:</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's a petition from a Florentine,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who hath for four or five removes come short</div>
                              <div class="line">To tender it herself. I undertook it,</div>
                              <div class="line">Vanquish'd thereto by the fair grace and speech</div>
                              <div class="line">Of the poor suppliant, who by this I know</div>
                              <div class="line">Is here attending: her business looks in her</div>
                              <div class="line">With an importing visage; and she told me,</div>
                              <div class="line">In a sweet verbal brief, it did concern</div>
                              <div class="line">Your highness with herself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  Upon his many protestations to marry me</div>
                              <div class="line">when his wife was dead, I blush to say it, he won</div>
                              <div class="line">me. Now is the Count Rousillon a widower: his vows</div>
                              <div class="line">are forfeited to me, and my honour's paid to him. He</div>
                              <div class="line">stole from Florence, taking no leave, and I follow</div>
                              <div class="line">him to his country for justice: grant it me, O</div>
                              <div class="line">king! in you it best lies; otherwise a seducer</div>
                              <div class="line">flourishes, and a poor maid is undone.</div>
                              <div class="line">DIANA CAPILET.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">I will buy me a son-in-law in a fair, and toll for</div>
                              <div class="line">this: I'll none of him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">The heavens have thought well on thee Lafeu,</div>
                              <div class="line">To bring forth this discovery. Seek these suitors:</div>
                              <div class="line">Go speedily and bring again the count.</div>
                              <div class="line">I am afeard the life of Helen, lady,</div>
                              <div class="line">Was foully snatch'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, justice on the doers!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter BERTRAM, guarded</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">I wonder, sir, sith wives are monsters to you,</div>
                              <div class="line">And that you fly them as you swear them lordship,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet you desire to marry.</div>
                              <p>Enter Widow and DIANA</p>
                              <div class="line">What woman's that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">I am, my lord, a wretched Florentine,</div>
                              <div class="line">Derived from the ancient Capilet:</div>
                              <div class="line">My suit, as I do understand, you know,</div>
                              <div class="line">And therefore know how far I may be pitied.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Widow</div>
                              <div class="line">I am her mother, sir, whose age and honour</div>
                              <div class="line">Both suffer under this complaint we bring,</div>
                              <div class="line">And both shall cease, without your remedy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Come hither, count; do you know these women?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, I neither can nor will deny</div>
                              <div class="line">But that I know them: do they charge me further?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why do you look so strange upon your wife?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">She's none of mine, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">If you shall marry,</div>
                              <div class="line">You give away this hand, and that is mine;</div>
                              <div class="line">You give away heaven's vows, and those are mine;</div>
                              <div class="line">You give away myself, which is known mine;</div>
                              <div class="line">For I by vow am so embodied yours,</div>
                              <div class="line">That she which marries you must marry me,</div>
                              <div class="line">Either both or none.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Your reputation comes too short for my daughter; you</div>
                              <div class="line">are no husband for her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, this is a fond and desperate creature,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom sometime I have laugh'd with: let your highness</div>
                              <div class="line">Lay a more noble thought upon mine honour</div>
                              <div class="line">Than for to think that I would sink it here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, for my thoughts, you have them ill to friend</div>
                              <div class="line">Till your deeds gain them: fairer prove your honour</div>
                              <div class="line">Than in my thought it lies.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Good my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ask him upon his oath, if he does think</div>
                              <div class="line">He had not my virginity.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">What say'st thou to her?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">She's impudent, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">And was a common gamester to the camp.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">He does me wrong, my lord; if I were so,</div>
                              <div class="line">He might have bought me at a common price:</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not believe him. O, behold this ring,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose high respect and rich validity</div>
                              <div class="line">Did lack a parallel; yet for all that</div>
                              <div class="line">He gave it to a commoner o' the camp,</div>
                              <div class="line">If I be one.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">COUNTESS</div>
                              <div class="line">He blushes, and 'tis it:</div>
                              <div class="line">Of six preceding ancestors, that gem,</div>
                              <div class="line">Conferr'd by testament to the sequent issue,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath it been owed and worn. This is his wife;</div>
                              <div class="line">That ring's a thousand proofs.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Methought you said</div>
                              <div class="line">You saw one here in court could witness it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">I did, my lord, but loath am to produce</div>
                              <div class="line">So bad an instrument: his name's Parolles.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">I saw the man to-day, if man he be.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Find him, and bring him hither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit an Attendant</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">What of him?</div>
                              <div class="line">He's quoted for a most perfidious slave,</div>
                              <div class="line">With all the spots o' the world tax'd and debosh'd;</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose nature sickens but to speak a truth.</div>
                              <div class="line">Am I or that or this for what he'll utter,</div>
                              <div class="line">That will speak any thing?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">She hath that ring of yours.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">I think she has: certain it is I liked her,</div>
                              <div class="line">And boarded her i' the wanton way of youth:</div>
                              <div class="line">She knew her distance and did angle for me,</div>
                              <div class="line">Madding my eagerness with her restraint,</div>
                              <div class="line">As all impediments in fancy's course</div>
                              <div class="line">Are motives of more fancy; and, in fine,</div>
                              <div class="line">Her infinite cunning, with her modern grace,</div>
                              <div class="line">Subdued me to her rate: she got the ring;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I had that which any inferior might</div>
                              <div class="line">At market-price have bought.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">I must be patient:</div>
                              <div class="line">You, that have turn'd off a first so noble wife,</div>
                              <div class="line">May justly diet me. I pray you yet;</div>
                              <div class="line">Since you lack virtue, I will lose a husband;</div>
                              <div class="line">Send for your ring, I will return it home,</div>
                              <div class="line">And give me mine again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">I have it not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">What ring was yours, I pray you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, much like</div>
                              <div class="line">The same upon your finger.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Know you this ring? this ring was his of late.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">And this was it I gave him, being abed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">The story then goes false, you threw it him</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of a casement.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">I have spoke the truth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter PAROLLES</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, I do confess the ring was hers.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">You boggle shrewdly, every feather stars you.</div>
                              <div class="line">Is this the man you speak of?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell me, sirrah, but tell me true, I charge you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not fearing the displeasure of your master,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which on your just proceeding I'll keep off,</div>
                              <div class="line">By him and by this woman here what know you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">So please your majesty, my master hath been an</div>
                              <div class="line">honourable gentleman: tricks he hath had in him,</div>
                              <div class="line">which gentlemen have.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, to the purpose: did he love this woman?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Faith, sir, he did love her; but how?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">How, I pray you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">He did love her, sir, as a gentleman loves a woman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">How is that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">He loved her, sir, and loved her not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">As thou art a knave, and no knave. What an</div>
                              <div class="line">equivocal companion is this!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">I am a poor man, and at your majesty's command.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">He's a good drum, my lord, but a naughty orator.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you know he promised me marriage?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Faith, I know more than I'll speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">But wilt thou not speak all thou knowest?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PAROLLES</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, so please your majesty. I did go between them,</div>
                              <div class="line">as I said; but more than that, he loved her: for</div>
                              <div class="line">indeed he was mad for her, and talked of Satan and</div>
                              <div class="line">of Limbo and of Furies and I know not what: yet I</div>
                              <div class="line">was in that credit with them at that time that I</div>
                              <div class="line">knew of their going to bed, and of other motions,</div>
                              <div class="line">as promising her marriage, and things which would</div>
                              <div class="line">derive me ill will to speak of; therefore I will not</div>
                              <div class="line">speak what I know.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast spoken all already, unless thou canst say</div>
                              <div class="line">they are married: but thou art too fine in thy</div>
                              <div class="line">evidence; therefore stand aside.</div>
                              <div class="line">This ring, you say, was yours?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my good lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Where did you buy it? or who gave it you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">It was not given me, nor I did not buy it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Who lent it you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">It was not lent me neither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Where did you find it, then?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">I found it not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">If it were yours by none of all these ways,</div>
                              <div class="line">How could you give it him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">I never gave it him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">This woman's an easy glove, my lord; she goes off</div>
                              <div class="line">and on at pleasure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">This ring was mine; I gave it his first wife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">It might be yours or hers, for aught I know.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Take her away; I do not like her now;</div>
                              <div class="line">To prison with her: and away with him.</div>
                              <div class="line">Unless thou tell'st me where thou hadst this ring,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou diest within this hour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll never tell you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Take her away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll put in bail, my liege.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">I think thee now some common customer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">By Jove, if ever I knew man, 'twas you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherefore hast thou accused him all this while?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Because he's guilty, and he is not guilty:</div>
                              <div class="line">He knows I am no maid, and he'll swear to't;</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll swear I am a maid, and he knows not.</div>
                              <div class="line">Great king, I am no strumpet, by my life;</div>
                              <div class="line">I am either maid, or else this old man's wife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">She does abuse our ears: to prison with her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Good mother, fetch my bail. Stay, royal sir:</div>
                              <p>Exit Widow</p>
                              <div class="line">The jeweller that owes the ring is sent for,</div>
                              <div class="line">And he shall surety me. But for this lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who hath abused me, as he knows himself,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though yet he never harm'd me, here I quit him:</div>
                              <div class="line">He knows himself my bed he hath defiled;</div>
                              <div class="line">And at that time he got his wife with child:</div>
                              <div class="line">Dead though she be, she feels her young one kick:</div>
                              <div class="line">So there's my riddle: one that's dead is quick:</div>
                              <div class="line">And now behold the meaning.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter Widow, with HELENA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Is there no exorcist</div>
                              <div class="line">Beguiles the truer office of mine eyes?</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't real that I see?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, my good lord;</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis but the shadow of a wife you see,</div>
                              <div class="line">The name and not the thing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">Both, both. O, pardon!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">O my good lord, when I was like this maid,</div>
                              <div class="line">I found you wondrous kind. There is your ring;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, look you, here's your letter; this it says:</div>
                              <div class="line">'When from my finger you can get this ring</div>
                              <div class="line">And are by me with child,' &c. This is done:</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you be mine, now you are doubly won?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BERTRAM</div>
                              <div class="line">If she, my liege, can make me know this clearly,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll love her dearly, ever, ever dearly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HELENA</div>
                              <div class="line">If it appear not plain and prove untrue,</div>
                              <div class="line">Deadly divorce step between me and you!</div>
                              <div class="line">O my dear mother, do I see you living?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LAFEU</div>
                              <div class="line">Mine eyes smell onions; I shall weep anon:</div>
                              <p>To PAROLLES</p>
                              <div class="line">Good Tom Drum, lend me a handkercher: so,</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank thee: wait on me home, I'll make sport with thee:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let thy courtesies alone, they are scurvy ones.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KING</div>
                              <div class="line">Let us from point to point this story know,</div>
                              <div class="line">To make the even truth in pleasure flow.</div>
                              <p>To DIANA</p>
                              <div class="line">If thou be'st yet a fresh uncropped flower,</div>
                              <div class="line">Choose thou thy husband, and I'll pay thy dower;</div>
                              <div class="line">For I can guess that by thy honest aid</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou keep'st a wife herself, thyself a maid.</div>
                              <div class="line">Of that and all the progress, more or less,</div>
                              <div class="line">Resolvedly more leisure shall express:</div>
                              <div class="line">All yet seems well; and if it end so meet,</div>
                              <div class="line">The bitter past, more welcome is the sweet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Flourish</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.5">
